title: Silver Summoner Border
body: Hey, I played ranked until I made it to Silver 5 last season, before the rewards were given out, but do not have the border that comes with it. If there's anything that you guys could do to help me get it, I would be extremely appreciative. Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Looking into this, I'm seeing some different results.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so we can help out individually.  We'll offer more context!
